alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 10:24PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, northeastern Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northern Gadsden and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida, southeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida, Decatur, western Grady and Seminole Counties in southwestern Georgia through 1130 PM EDT/1030 PM CDT/... At 1023 PM EDT/923 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Donalsonville to 7 miles northwest of Chattahoochee to 13 miles southeast of Vernon. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Marianna, Bainbridge, Quincy, Donalsonville, Havana, Whigham, Chattahoochee, Greensboro, West Bainbridge, Bradford, Sneads, Gretna, Bristol, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Altha, Alford, Attapulgus and Wausau. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
